name: Clicker Jam - Interdimensional Moon Defense
description:
Space to pause.

Made for the Clicker game jam. Not really fully complete. There is no endgame. Just improve your weapons to do more damage.

Credits

Art/Design/Programming - Pyxel Wyxel (except 3D Earth by zonked on Open Game Art)

Music - MelloTodd/Ivy Republic

Font - Kenney Fonts

SFX - Gamemaster Audio
